thread.section_title: Rush Order Tees Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Rush Order Tees | rushordertees.com
thread.title: Roy Birney
thread.title_full: Rush Order Tees reviewed by Roy Birney

author: Roy Birney
title: Roy Birney
text:
Rush Order Tees has great customer service. They contacted me several times to let me know when my Shirts were ready for review and then called me to work through a few issues I had with how the design looked.
It was very nice that they took the time to review the shirts and let me review them and make changes.
